mutants.original_line: return [float(val) if '.' in val else int(val) for val in values]
mutants.mutated_line: return [float(val) if '.' not in val else int(val) for val in values]

mutants.original_line: return [float(val) if '.' in val else int(val) for val in values]
mutants.mutated_line: return [float(val) if '' in val else int(val) for val in values]
